thread.section_title: Andaz Wall Street - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Chic and a lot of space
thread.title_full: Chic and a lot of space - Review of Andaz Wall Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MGL324
title: Chic and a lot of space
text:
NYC hotel rooms are notoriously small but the Andaz's rooms are absolutely huge. The boutique brand of the Hyatt Hotels group offers chic modern surroundings, innovative room features and a foot print that is about twice the size of regular NYC hotel rooms.
The rooms are in good condition. Our only complaint was the room ran a bit hot, but that was easily remedied by opening the window. The hotel offers 24/7 coffee, tea and snack service in the lobby - it's a nice touch.
The location was a 4 minute walk to the Staten Island Ferry...a 10 minute walk to the Statue of Liberty ferry. Subway service is a short 4 minutes away. It's convenient to may lower Manhattan venues.
The staff is oh so friendly, efficient and polite. Overall, a really good stay and a good value for the money.
